rules_text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, exile a creature card from your hand or graveyard.
Create a token that's a copy of the exiled card, except it's an Illusion in addition to its other types. When that token leaves the battlefield, return the exiled card to your hand.
flavor_text: [i]Physical or ephemeral, reality or fantasy- these borders no longer matter. Gensokyo accepts all.[/i]
